items.sentence: I didn\'t know that someone was following me.
I didn\'t know there was anything else to do.
I didn\'t know you could cook this well, Tom.
Tom\'s parents and his wife don\'t get along.
Have you decided who you\'re going to invite?
I can\'t even see the other ship in this fog.
I can\'t find my ticket. I must have lost it.
Tom checked out three books from the library.
Tom checked three books out from the library.
Tom closed his eyes and tried to concentrate.
Tom decided that he wanted to eat by himself.
Tom decided that he wanted to live in Boston.
Tom decided to send Mary to a private school.
Don\'t throw the baby out with the bathwater.
Don\'t try to do two things at the same time.
Don\'t waste my time asking stupid questions.
Don\'t worry about it. Just get back to work.
Are you sure you can handle this by yourself?
At last, he became aware of his own mistakes.
Tom asked me if I knew Mary\'s email address.
